Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE

The root is a sequence:   1. receive_order  2. check_inventory  3. xor_node (either branch)  4. close_order So any trace must start with receive_order, then check_inventory, then one of the two branches from xor_node, then close_order. Case 1: successful branch.  The successful_subtree is a parallel (AND) of authorize_payment, package_items, ship_order. In process trees, parallel means all permutations of these three activities are allowed, but they must all occur exactly once, and they can interleave arbitrarily.
